title: Friday lunchtime lecture: What difference does linked data make to maps?

details.description:
You bring your lunch, we provide tea & coffee, an interesting talk, and enough time to get back to your desk.

For our 7th March lecture... What difference does linked data make to maps?

Ian Holt, Head of Developer Outreach at Ordnance Survey, will explain and demonstrate what difference the addition of linked data sets has made to the organisation's open map data.

Using examples and case studies, he will show what linked data makes possible for publishers and app developers, and what it might mean for those of us who use maps every day.
